title: Elon Musk predicts AI evolution will force money as concept to disappear, working to be optional in less than 20 years
description: Musk agrees that there are dangers associated with artificial Intelligence (AI), and believes that developers should ensure that the technology values truth, beauty, and curiosity.

title: CSU Global offers artificial intelligence, machine learning degree
description: A Littleton woman is among those taking college courses to develop skills in AI. Kaitlyn McCormick is working toward a master's degree in the field to stay "relevant" in her tech job.
content:

description: The move by the parent company of ChatGPT is meant to help imbue Thrive Holdings’ accounting and I.T. services companies with artificial intelligence tools.
